alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Cass, northern Pettis, southwestern Saline, southern Lafayette, southern Jackson and Johnson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cleveland to near La Monte. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Raytown, Grandview, Belton, Sedalia, Raymore, Warrensburg, Grain Valley, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Oak Grove, Odessa, Greenwood, Higginsville, Peculiar, Knob Noster, Concordia and Holden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 42 and 85. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 435 between mile markers 66 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Saline
